edu.ucla.sspace.index

Class GaussianVectorGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.index.GaussianVectorGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DoubleVectorGenerator<DoubleVector>, Generator<DoubleVector>, Serializable

    public class GaussianVectorGenerator
extends Object
implements DoubleVectorGenerator<DoubleVector>, Serializable
    A Generator for vectors where each entry is from a guassian distribution having some mean and standard deviation. This class supports the following properties:
    Property: "edu.ucla.sspace.index.GuassianVectorGenerator.stdev"
    Default:
    This variable is the standard deviation used when generating random numbers from a gaussian distribution

    Property: "edu.ucla.sspace.index.GuassianVectorGenerator.mean"
    Default: "0"
    This variable is the mean used for generating values from gaussian distribution for vectors

    Author:
    Keith Stevens
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
